properties.property: insert into td_sm_log_his select *,? as LOG_ARCHTIME from td_sm_log
update TD_SM_LOGMODULE set status=? where id=?
update TD_SM_LOGMODULE set status=#[status] where id=#[id]

select * from td_sm_log_his where 1=1 #if($logContent && !$logContent.equals("")) and LOG_CONTENT =#[logContent] #end #if($logOpertime_start ) and LOG_OPERTIME>=#[logOpertime_start] #end #if($logOpertime_end ) and LOG_OPERTIME<=#[logOpertime_end] #end #if($logOperuser && !$logOperuser.equals("")) and LOG_OPERUSER like #[logOperuser] #end #if($logVisitorial && !$logVisitorial.equals("")) and LOG_VISITORIAL like #[logVisitorial] #end #if($operModule && !$operModule.equals("") && !$operModule.equals("-1")) and OPER_MODULE =#[operModule] #end order by LOG_OPERTIME desc

select * from td_sm_log where 1=1 #if($logContent && !$logContent.equals("")) and LOG_CONTENT =#[logContent] #end #if($logOpertime_start ) and LOG_OPERTIME>=#[logOpertime_start] #end #if($logOpertime_end ) and LOG_OPERTIME<=#[logOpertime_end] #end #if($logOperuser && !$logOperuser.equals("")) and LOG_OPERUSER like #[logOperuser] #end #if($logVisitorial && !$logVisitorial.equals("")) and LOG_VISITORIAL like #[logVisitorial] #end #if($operModule && !$operModule.equals("") && !$operModule.equals("-1")) and OPER_MODULE =#[operModule] #end order by LOG_OPERTIME desc
